name: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
benefits: Covers over 1,949 medical packages for secondary and tertiary care.

name: Central Government Health Scheme (CGHS)
benefits: OPD, hospitalization, diagnostics, etc.

name: Bajaj Allianz Health Guard
benefits: Cashless hospitalization, ambulance cover, daily cash benefit.

name: HDFC ERGO Optima Secure
benefits: SECURE benefit, hospitalization, day care, home healthcare.

name: Arogya Sanjeevani Policy
benefits: Hospitalization expenses including pre and post.

name: ECHS
benefits: Covers medical care through polyclinics and empaneled hospitals.

name: Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY)
benefits: Hospitalisation coverage for 5 members.
premium: Free for families below poverty line

name: Mukhyamantri Amrutam Yojana (Gujarat)
benefits: Covers serious illnesses and complex procedures.

name: Dr. YSR Aarogyasri Scheme (Andhra Pradesh)
benefits: Covers treatments for 1,059 diseases.

name: Chief Minister’s Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme (Tamil Nadu)
benefits: Covers medical and surgical treatment.

name: Karnataka Arogya Sanjeevani Scheme
coverage: Full medical expenses for cashless treatment
benefits: Covers a range of illnesses and procedures.

name: Star Health Comprehensive
benefits: Automatic restoration of sum insured, OPD cover, and second opinion.

name: ManipalCigna ProHealth
benefits: Bonus for no claims, health check-ups, and international coverage.

name: Care Health Care Freedom
benefits: No medical check-up required up to age 70.

name: Niva Bupa ReAssure
benefits: ReAssure Benefit, cashless hospitalization, and health check-ups.

name: HDFC ERGO my:health Suraksha
benefits: Covers hospitalization, day care procedures, and pre & post-hospitalization costs.

name: Royal Sundaram Lifeline Classic
benefits: Global coverage for specified illnesses, maternity cover.

name: Aditya Birla Activ Health Platinum
benefits: HealthReturns benefit, chronic management program.

name: National Health Insurance Scheme (NHIS) - Nigeria
benefits: Covers primary and secondary healthcare.

name: Vidal Health
provider: Vidal Health Insurance TPA Pvt Ltd
benefits: Cashless hospitalization, policy administration.
